text: What led to Channing Tatum and Jenna Dewan's split? Channing Tatum and Jenna Dewan officially announced their split on Monday night after months of speculation that the couple was heading for a divorce. Fans were stunned to hear the news that the pair had decided to end their nine - year marriage and couldn ’ t help but wonder what caused the sad breakup. According to an April 3 report by Radar Online, there were many factors that led to the end of Channing Tatum and Jenna Dewan ’ s marriage. The first is likely the fact that Tatum wanted to have more children. The actor and his estranged wife are the parents of one daughter, Everly, but it seems that the Magic Mike star wanted a bigger family, which is something that Dewan didn ’ t seem to be on board with
